title: Endoscopic study of the prostate = Les Adenomes de la prostate etude endoscopique
subject_group: Education, Instruction, Teaching & Schools/Biology - Study and teaching

description: This film highlights the disease issues related to prostate medical condition focussing on the various issues arising with pre and post operation. In medical linguistics it explores the diverse complications of the prostatic cavity.
